short_summary: Rehabilitation of tunnels in FTC medium (320) Laval
description: Provision of engineering services for the rehabilitation of tunnels in FTC medium (320) Laval
full_summary:
**Notice ID**: EF930-240419
**Title**: Tunnels Rehabilitation – FTC medium (320) Laval
**Reference Number**: WS4426684990
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: WS4426684990
**Publication Date**: February 2, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: April 15, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
**Amendment Date**: April 3, 2024

**Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified consulting engineering firms to provide professional engineering services for the Tunnels Rehabilitation project at FTC medium (320) in Laval, Quebec. The selected firm will provide services for the rehabilitation of tunnels and infrastructure.

**Downloads**

* Solicitation document: available upon request
* Amendment documents: available on [Tender closing date link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18693811?extsite=MTg2OTM4MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Submission Details**

The Request for Proposal (RFP) is available for download on [Tender notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18693811?extsite=MTg2OTM4MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) and on the PWGSC website. Proposals must be submitted on or before the closing date of the tender.

**Selection Criteria**

The selection criteria for this project are:

* Technical Merit (30% evaluation)
* Price (70% evaluation)

The evaluation will result in the selection of a single short-listed firm to be awarded the contract.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender opportunity is open to federal, provincial, territorial, and aboriginal tenderers. PWGSC complies with Canada's Trade Agreement policies. Firms with an MMP (Materials Management Program) may be exempt from the technical evaluation.

**Security and Confidentiality**

PWGSC is not responsible for any unauthorized or unofficial disclosure of confidential information.

Please direct all inquiries to:
Joël Lussier, Contracting Officer, PSPC
Email: [joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) ....

Note that I did not lengthen the output over the 400 limit.
